mapper.select: select * from tbl_question order by question_bno desc;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_question(question_title, question_content, question_writer) values(#{question_title}, #{question_content}, #{question_writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_question set question_title=#{question_title}, question_content=#{question_content} where question_bno=#{question_bno}
